column1: The Lay of Leithian adapted is a fan-originated attempt to reconcile the Lay of Leithian with the later mythology as given in The Silmarillion.
The intent of the project is to provide a modern edition of an unbroken account of the tale
column3: utilizing J.R.R. Tolkiens latest writing and thought on the subject as much as possible. Some minor revisions
column4: emendation and additions to Tolkiens original work are present but noted. The site is fully annotated and contains all of Tolkiens latest text and revisions integrated into the body of the poem.  The final section of the tale
column6: is appended to the end to fill in the remainder of the story where the fragment leaves off.
